channel.title: Sprites NEED HELP Ddsspeced base
channel.description:
Hello :)
Ok first, i'm trying to change my prayer icons in my sprites and my hp bar's in my sprites to but i can't seem to find them anywhere in there. I even looked in hidden folders it's just so annoying and frustrating.. I just want to know how to edit my hp bars and my prayer icons. Answers would be much appreciated
if you want to look at my sprites files heres the download its virus free and only 500kb link:http://www.mediafire.com/?98su611e6w07xk1
thank you!!
